title: Introductory Walking of Padang
summary: Explore Padang on foot! Discover city landmarks, culture, and history through beach and street walks, with stops for local insights and authentic food tasting.
description: A city cruise on your foot!  Discover all about city cultures and landmarks through a combination of beach and street walking. Along the way you'll get brief interesting information about the local culture, history and etc. Some stops will be made to delve all about Padang, the capital city of West Sumatra. The trip will include tasting the authentic local food.
overview:
A city cruise on your foot! Discover all about city cultures and landmarks through a combination of beach and street walking. Along the way you'll get brief interesting information about the local culture, history and etc. Some stops will be made to delve all about Padang, the capital city of West Sumatra. The trip will include tasting the authentic local food.

  • Open Trip and small group number (max = 10 pax)
  • 4-4,5 hours walking tour of Padang important and historical landmark as well as the city culture discovery.
  • Padang Beach “Morning or Sunset” atmosphere (depends on selected schedule).
  • Morning schedule starts at 08.000 am and Sunset schedule starts 03.30 pm.
  • Interesting truth all about the city.
  • This is a private or small group tour that you'll receive personalized attention from your guide.
  • Ideal tour for first-time visitors to Padang or those short on time

includes.name: Hotel pickup and drop-off (private air condition vehicles)
Lunch or dinner (depends on selected schedule)
Candid documentation from our hidden photographer

additionalInfo.name: Confirmation will be received at time of booking
No minimum numbers apply (1 person booking is the minimum)
This tour/activity will have a maximum of 10 travelers
This trip also suitable for a photography desire. (Available for street, architect, travel, food and documentary photography)
Operates in all weather conditions; please dress appropriately and wear comfortable walking shoes

A dress code is required to enter certain places such as of worship and selected museums. No shorts or sleeveless tops allowed. Knees and shoulders must be covered for both men and women. You may risk refused entry if you fail to comply with these dress requirements
No heart problems or other serious medical conditions
Your health is our top priority, and we have put special measures in place to keep all guests safe both during and after your activity
Important: The chat function offered is NOT instant. In case you need us either call us or send a Whatsapp message!

pickupDetails: We will pick you up to your hotel. You will get information for picking up time since the tour is “open” that there is possibility for staying in the different hotel.
dropOffDetails: As the tour “end”, you will be drop - off to your hotel. We will adjust the route if there are some different hotels to stay.

expect.desc:
After hotel pickup, you'll be drop to the tour starting points. Take a walk, where your informative guide leads to share the history, arts, culture, and architecture of this charming city. It begins on Padang Beach to the old town area.

The beach offers pedestrian a scenic promenade where interesting the different local activities are the daily ambiance. Learn about Indian Ocean Rim Association Monument and the fishermen district. Along the walk you'll find many coffee shop and street foods as it is a popular place to hang for locals which mostly getting burst at afternoon to the end of the evening.

In the city main trading center, a largest bursting market, you will find how local culture and traditions meet. While in another main economic activity center, you will discover how local ethnic and migrated ethnic, run their traditions and activities in respect and peace.

Head to know about how fishermen villages near the river develop to be a city from an area called “Padang Old Town”. Then, let's have time for a break and enjoy your lunch or dinner (depends on selected schedule). Later, the guide will inform you about the hotel drop-off and for some who interest to chill out in a café for a drink or coffee, the guide pleasantly accompany (at your own cost) and the hotel drop-off arrangement still free.

attractions.title: Padang Beach
attractions.description:
A popular public beach area with a narrow shoreline that filled by are some city landmarks, coffee shops, street food sellers and fishermen district.
  • IORA Monument

    Walking Starting Point - The guide will share about the site (10 minutes est.)

  • Fishermen District

    Stop - The guide will share about the site (10 minutes est.)

attractions.title: Bursting Local Market
attractions.description:
It is time discover how the culture and the traditions adapts to modern life. It is also a chance to see the real local daily life.

Stop - The guide will share about the site

attractions.title: China Town of Padang
attractions.description:
Discover how hundred years acculturation process has resulted in the contribution of the Minangkabau and Chinese ethnic groups in maintaining their respective traditions

  • Chinese Temple

    Stop - The guide will share about the site (10 minutes est)

  • Batipuah Mosque

    Stop - The guide will share about the site (10 minutes est)

attractions.title: Padang Old Town
attractions.description:
An area where the city first civilization began and a lot of many cities heritage still able to be seen.

  • Train Station

    The guide will share about the site (10 minutes)

  • Local Restaurant

    We will have a break for about 60 minutes est.

  • Padangsche Spaarbank

    Pass By

  • Gebouw Handelssonderneming Geo Whehry & Co

    Pass By

  • De Javasche Bank
  • Muaro Harbour

    The guide will share about the passed by sites (10 minutes)
